Namaste !!


I am 21 year undergrad who joined IIT as a Mechanical Engineer, later turning into an enthusiastic python developer.
I'm a part of IMG, IIT Rookee which is a campus group that develops and maintains applications for campus intranet/internet. We do also handle our college website(Have a look at our updated web-presence).

Interests

  • Trekking(Check my instagram link below)
  • Guitar/Music -- Jack White
  • Reading
  • Web scraping

Super 30 alumnus, I am currently reviewing a book on web scraping through python.

Tech Stacks

bash, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Jekyll, Git,
MATLAB, Matpolib, NumPy, SciPy

Baba, Ka Hal Chal !!
